policy_constraints.policy_description: Implementation of additional export controls on advanced computing integrated circuits (ICs), computer commodities containing such ICs, and certain semiconductor manufacturing items, along with controls on certain U.S. person activities. This rule also added a new red flag for semiconductor fabrication facilities' compliance with the advanced computing FDP rule.
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Commerce Department

policy_constraints.policy_description: Publication of interim final rules (SME IFR and AC/S IFR) to implement additional export controls on semiconductor manufacturing items and advanced computing items, with updates and corrections. These rules reinforce controls to restrict China's ability to purchase and manufacture advanced chips critical for military advantage.
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Commerce Department

policy_constraints.policy_description: Corrections and additional clarifications for the interim final rules on Export Controls on Semiconductor Manufacturing Items (SME IFR) and Implementation of Additional Export Controls: Certain Advanced Computing Items; Supercomputer and Semiconductor End Use; Updates and Corrections (AC/S IFR).
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Commerce Department

policy_constraints.policy_description: Addition of 80 entities to the Entity List for activities contrary to U.S. national security and foreign policy, specifically to restrict the Chinese Communist Party's (CCP) ability to acquire and develop high-performance and exascale computing capabilities, as well as quantum technologies, for military applications.
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Commerce Department

factual_actions.description: Dell owns manufacturing facilities in multiple countries.
Dell monitors and seeks to mitigate risks from trade protection measures and disputes by adjusting its manufacturing, supply chain, and distribution networks.
Dell Technologies announced plans to open a new merge and logistics fulfillment center in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

competitor_factual_moves.description: HPE's manufacturing of product components, final assembly, and other critical operations are concentrated in various geographic locations.

regional_demand_signals.description: Countries worldwide will make AI sovereignty a national imperative, focusing on homegrown AI strategies, data localization, nurturing domestic innovation, and reducing reliance on foreign technology.
Governments' approaches to Sovereign AI are shaped by economic benefits specific to a country's aspirations within the digital economy. Dell is engaging with governments on this.
